carousel_list.carousel_info: At its most basic form, a portfolio website provides professional information about an individual or a company and presents a showcase of their work.

A scheduler coordinates the daily schedules within a medical facility. Their primary duties typically involve managing the flow of patient care. A scheduler's responsibilities can include: Scheduling patient appointments for consultations, medical procedures and follow-up visits.
Schedule Team Meetings without the Hassle of Back-and-Forth Emails.
